About.paragraph: We deliver scaleable business systems and hosting

Services.name: Hosting
Services.text: We ensure you can own your computer and data, or rent if your data governance allows.

Services.name: Business systems
Services.text: We deliver business systems that improves ROI through understanding your business.

Services.name: Governance Structures
Services.text: We understand your risks we monitor and alert we support and maintain assets

Services.name: Market Analysis
Services.text: Understand the technology choices you are making.

Services.name: Data Analysis
Services.text: Convert to a management style that is data-led, your unique goals put in a trackable framework for success.

Services.name: Research
Services.text: We research tech, and companies to deliver actionable insights.

Contact.address: Our staff is dispersed accross 45 cities

Features.title: 1. Establish your objectives
Features.text: We start on by assessing the success factors. We create a plan that gives us indications of the success and failure. We decide thresholds for the performance levels of your needs with estimates of changes.

Features.title: 2. Define plan
Features.text: We plan your system with implementation and migration. You need to ensure the system will work, is secure and delivers on what you need now and down the road.

Features.title: 3. Deliver, test and monitor
Features.text: Beyond delivery, automated and integrated testing is needed with human testing. The monitoring needs to look for issues you have now. learned lessons from other clients and alert any issues.
